name: Yeah Bunny!
description:
This wonderful platformer takes you on adventure to the magical bunny world.

Touch control never been so easy and accurate! Jump and climb on the walls just by tapping anywhere on the screen. Collect carrots and keys to complete the levels and reach different amazing worlds with unique characters and enemies!

This tiny bunny is a hero who wants to explore another lands with you, will you come and play?

> 9 unique worlds to complete
> 3 different climate zones to visit
> natural and satisfying touch control
> easy to learn and addictive gameplay
> 48 fun levels to complete
> cute pixel visuals
> achievements to collect
> iMessage stickers
> 4 bosses to beat
